February 23, 2026\n  </p>\n\n  <p><a href=\"https://docs.github.com/en/pages\">https://docs.github.com/en/pages</a></p>\n\n<h1 id=\"jekyll--github-pages--complete-user-guide\">Jekyll + GitHub Pages — Complete User Guide</h1>\n\n<p>A practical, step-by-step guide to building and deploying a Jekyll website using GitHub Pages.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"table-of-contents\">Table of Contents</h1>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>What You’re Building</li>\n  <li>Prerequisites</li>\n  <li>Creating a New Jekyll Site</li>\n  <li>Understanding the Project Structure</li>\n  <li>Running Jekyll Locally</li>\n  <li>Creating Posts and Pages</li>\n  <li>Configuring <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></li>\n  <li>Using Liquid (Templating Basics)</li>\n  <li>Preparing for GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li>Deploying to GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li>Custom Domains</li>\n  <li>Troubleshooting</li>\n  <li>Best Practices</li>\n</ol>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"1-what-youre-building\">1. What You’re Building</h1>\n\n<p>Jekyll is a <strong>static site generator</strong>.</p>\n\n<p>You write:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Markdown</li>\n  <li>HTML</li>\n  <li>YAML config</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Jekyll generates:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Static HTML files</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>GitHub Pages hosts:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>The generated static site</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"2-prerequisites\">2. Prerequisites</h1>\n\n<p>Install:</p>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Ruby (recommended via rbenv or asdf)</li>\n  <li>Bundler</li>\n  <li>Git</li>\n  <li>GitHub account</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Check versions:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>ruby <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\ngem <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\nbundle <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\ngit <span class=\"nt\">--version</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"3-creating-a-new-jekyll-site\">3. Creating a New Jekyll Site</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"create-project\">Create project</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>gem <span class=\"nb\">install </span>jekyll bundler\njekyll new my-site\n<span class=\"nb\">cd </span>my-site\nbundle <span class=\"nb\">install</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"project-structure\">Project structure</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>my-site/\n├── _config.yml\n├── _posts/\n├── _layouts/\n├── _includes/\n├── _site/        (generated)\n├── Gemfile\n└── index.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"4-running-jekyll-locally\">4. Running Jekyll Locally</h1>\n\n<p>Start the development server:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve <span class=\"nt\">--livereload</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Visit:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>http://localhost:4000\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Build only:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll build\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Clean:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll clean\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"5-creating-posts\">5. Creating Posts</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"file-naming-format\">File naming format</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>_posts/YYYY-MM-DD-title.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Example:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-markdown highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n<span class=\"na\">layout</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">post</span>\n<span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">My</span><span class=\"nv\"> </span><span class=\"s\">First</span><span class=\"nv\"> </span><span class=\"s\">Post\"</span>\n<span class=\"na\">date</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">2026-02-24</span>\n<span class=\"na\">categories</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"pi\">[</span><span class=\"nv\">blog</span><span class=\"pi\">]</span>\n<span class=\"na\">tags</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"pi\">[</span><span class=\"nv\">jekyll</span><span class=\"pi\">,</span> <span class=\"nv\">github</span><span class=\"pi\">]</span>\n<span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n\nThis is my first post.\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"6-creating-pages\">6. Creating Pages</h1>\n\n<p>Create a page like <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">about.md</code>:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-markdown highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n<span class=\"na\">layout</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">page</span>\n<span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">About</span>\n<span class=\"na\">permalink</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">/about/</span>\n<span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n\nThis is the about page.\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"7-understanding-_configyml\">7. Understanding <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></h1>\n\n<p>Example configuration:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-yaml highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">My Website</span>\n<span class=\"na\">description</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">Personal blog</span>\n<span class=\"na\">url</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">https://username.github.io\"</span>\n<span class=\"na\">baseurl</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">\"</span>   <span class=\"c1\"># Use \"/repo-name\" for project sites</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">markdown</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">kramdown</span>\n<span class=\"na\">permalink</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">/blog/:title/</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">timezone</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">America/New_York</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">plugins</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span>\n  <span class=\"pi\">-</span> <span class=\"s\">jekyll-feed</span>\n  <span class=\"pi\">-</span> <span class=\"s\">jekyll-seo-tag</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"important-baseurl\">Important: baseurl</h2>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>User site → <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">\"\"</code></li>\n  <li>Project site → <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">\"/repository-name\"</code></li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Example:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-yaml highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"na\">baseurl</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">/my-repo\"</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"8-using-liquid-templating\">8. Using Liquid (Templating)</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"output-variables\">Output variables</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>Dev-pages\nGithub Pages\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"loop-posts\">Loop posts</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>&lt;ul&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/24/testpost/\"&gt;\n        My New Post\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/24/tailwind/\"&gt;\n        Tailwind\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/24/markdown/\"&gt;\n        Markdown\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/24/jekyll/\"&gt;\n        Jekyll\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/23/github-pages/\"&gt;\n        Github Pages\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n&lt;/ul&gt;\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"conditionals\">Conditionals</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>\n  &lt;p&gt;This is a blog post&lt;/p&gt;\n\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"9-preparing-for-github-pages\">9. Preparing for GitHub Pages</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"commit-your-project\">Commit your project</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>git init\ngit add <span class=\"nb\">.</span>\ngit commit <span class=\"nt\">-m</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"Initial commit\"</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"create-github-repository\">Create GitHub repository</h2>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Go to GitHub</li>\n  <li>Click “New Repository”</li>\n  <li>Name it:</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>User site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>username.github.io\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Project site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>my-project\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"10-deploying-to-github-pages\">10. Deploying to GitHub Pages</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"option-a--let-github-build-jekyll-recommended-for-simple-sites\">Option A — Let GitHub Build Jekyll (Recommended for simple sites)</h2>\n\n<p>Push to GitHub:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>git remote add origin https://github.com/username/repo-name.git\ngit branch <span class=\"nt\">-M</span> main\ngit push <span class=\"nt\">-u</span> origin main\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Then:</p>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Go to Repository Settings</li>\n  <li>Click “Pages”</li>\n  <li>Under “Source” → Select:\n    <ul>\n      <li>Branch: <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">main</code></li>\n      <li>Folder: <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">/ (root)</code></li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n  <li>Save</li>\n</ol>\n\n<p>Your site will be available at:</p>\n\n<p>User site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>https://username.github.io\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Project site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>https://username.github.io/repo-name/\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"option-b--deploy-built-_site-folder-advanced\">Option B — Deploy Built <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> Folder (Advanced)</h2>\n\n<p>Build locally:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll build\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Deploy <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> contents to <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">gh-pages</code> branch.</p>\n\n<p>Often done with GitHub Actions.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"11-custom-domain\">11. Custom Domain</h1>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Add a <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">CNAME</code> file to project root:</li>\n</ol>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>example.com\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Commit and push</li>\n  <li>In GitHub Pages settings:\n    <ul>\n      <li>Add custom domain</li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n  <li>Configure DNS:\n    <ul>\n      <li>A record → GitHub IPs</li>\n      <li>OR CNAME → username.github.io</li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n</ol>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"12-github-pages-plugin-limitations\">12. GitHub Pages Plugin Limitations</h1>\n\n<p>GitHub Pages only supports approved plugins.</p>\n\n<p>Supported examples:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>jekyll-feed</li>\n  <li>jekyll-seo-tag</li>\n  <li>jekyll-sitemap</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>If you need custom plugins:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Use GitHub Actions</li>\n  <li>Build site yourself</li>\n  <li>Deploy static output</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"13-drafts\">13. Drafts</h1>\n\n<p>Create <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_drafts/</code> folder.</p>\n\n<p>Add:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>_drafts/my-draft.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Serve with:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve <span class=\"nt\">--drafts</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"14-common-issues\">14. Common Issues</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"broken-css-or-links\">Broken CSS or Links</h2>\n\n<p>Cause:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Incorrect <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">baseurl</code></li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Fix:\nUse:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>/dev-pages/assets/css/style.css\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"404-errors\">404 Errors</h2>\n\n<p>Cause:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Wrong permalink</li>\n  <li>Missing trailing slash</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"liquid-errors\">Liquid Errors</h2>\n\n<p>Check terminal output for line numbers.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"site-not-updating\">Site Not Updating</h2>\n\n<p>Try:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll clean\nbundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"15-recommended-folder-structure\">15. Recommended Folder Structure</h1>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>.\n├── _config.yml\n├── _layouts/\n├── _includes/\n├── _posts/\n├── _data/\n├── assets/\n│   ├── css/\n│   ├── js/\n│   └── img/\n└── index.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"16-best-practices\">16. Best Practices</h1>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Always use <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">relative_url</code></li>\n  <li>Keep layouts minimal</li>\n  <li>Use collections for custom content types</li>\n  <li>Avoid heavy plugins</li>\n  <li>Keep <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> out of git (add to <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">.gitignore</code>)</li>\n  <li>Test locally before pushing</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"17-quick-deployment-checklist\">17. Quick Deployment Checklist</h1>\n\n<ul class=\"task-list\">\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Install Ruby + Bundler</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Create Jekyll site</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Configure <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Test locally</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Create GitHub repository</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Push code</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Enable GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Verify live URL</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"18-final-workflow-summary\">18. Final Workflow Summary</h1>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>Write Markdown\n      ↓\nRun jekyll serve\n      ↓\nCommit &amp; push to GitHub\n      ↓\nGitHub Pages builds site\n      ↓\nWebsite is live\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<p>You now have a complete workflow for building and deploying Jekyll sites with GitHub Pages.</p>\n\n</article>\n\n        </main>\n\n      </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <footer class=\"bg-slate-100 border-t border-slate-200 mt-16 dark:bg-neutral-950 dark:border-neutral-800\">\n All rights reserved.\n  </div>\n\n  <script>\n    (function () {\n      var root = document.documentElement;\n      var toggle = document.getElementById(\"theme-toggle\");\n      var key = \"theme\";\n\n      document.getElementById(\"year\").textContent = new Date().getFullYear();\n\n      if (!toggle) return;\n\n      function setTheme(theme, persist) {\n        var dark = theme === \"dark\";\n        root.classList.toggle(\"dark\", dark);\n        root.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", dark ? \"dark\" : \"light\");\n\n        if (persist) {\n          localStorage.setItem(key, dark ? \"dark\" : \"light\");\n        }\n\n        toggle.textContent = dark ? \"Light\" : \"Dark\";\n        toggle.setAttribute(\"aria-label\", dark ? \"Switch to light mode\" : \"Switch to dark mode\");\n      }\n\n      setTheme(root.classList.contains(\"dark\") ? \"dark\" : \"light\", false);\n\n      toggle.addEventListener(\"click\", function () {\n        setTheme(root.classList.contains(\"dark\") ? \"light\" : \"dark\", true);\n      });\n    })();\n  </script>\n</footer>\n\n\n  </body>\n</html>\n","[https://jekyllrb.com/docs/](https://jekyllrb.com/docs/)\n\n\n# Jekyll Websites — Overview\n\n## What Jekyll is (in one paragraph)\nJekyll is a **static site generator**: you write content in **Markdown/HTML**, configure site behavior with **YAML**, and Jekyll builds a folder of **static files** (HTML/CSS/JS) you can host anywhere (GitHub Pages, Netlify, S3, etc.). It shines for blogs, docs, and marketing sites that don’t need a dynamic backend.\n\n---\n\n## Mental Model\n**Inputs**\n- Markdown posts/pages\n- Layouts and includes (Liquid templates)\n- Data files (YAML/JSON/CSV)\n- Config (`_config.yml`)\n- Assets (`assets/`)\n\n**Build**\n- Jekyll processes Markdown + Liquid + front matter\n- Generates static HTML into `_site/`\n\n**Output**\n- `_site/` is the deployable website\n\n---\n\n## Common Folder Structure\n```txt\n.\n├─ _config.yml\n├─ Gemfile\n├─ index.md (or index.html)\n├─ _layouts/\n│  ├─ default.html\n│  ├─ page.html\n│  └─ post.html\n├─ _includes/\n│  ├─ head.html\n│  ├─ header.html\n│  └─ footer.html\n├─ _posts/\n│  └─ 2026-02-24-my-post-title.md\n├─ _data/\n│  └─ navigation.yml\n├─ _sass/              (optional)\n├─ assets/\n│  ├─ css/\n│  ├─ js/\n│  └─ img/\n└─ _site/              (generated, do not edit)\n\n\n# Key Concepts\n\n## 1) Front Matter (YAML)\n\nFront matter is YAML at the top of a Markdown/HTML file that sets metadata and controls rendering.\n\n```yaml\n---\nlayout: post\ntitle: \"Hello Jekyll\"\ndate: 2026-02-24\npermalink: /blog/hello/\ncategories: [news]\ntags: [jekyll, liquid]\n---\n```\n\n## 2) Layouts (_layouts)\n\nLayouts wrap content. A layout must include \\`\\{\\{ content \\}\\}\\` where the page/post body should appear.\n\n{% raw %}\n```html\n<!-- _layouts/default.html -->\n<!doctype html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n  <head>{% include head.html %}</head>\n  <body>\n    {% include header.html %}\n    <main>{{ content }}</main>\n    {% include footer.html %}\n  </body>\n</html>\n```\n{% endraw %}\n## 3) Includes (_includes)\n\nReusable partials: nav, head tags, footer, etc.\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n{% include header.html %}\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n## 4) Liquid (templating language)\n\nJekyll uses Liquid for variables, loops, conditionals, and filters.\n\n---\n\n# Build & Run Cheatsheet\n\n## Install & Serve\n\n```bash\nbundle install\nbundle exec jekyll serve --livereload\n```\n\n## Build\n\n```bash\nbundle exec jekyll build\n```\n\n## Clean (remove generated files)\n\n```bash\nbundle exec jekyll clean\n```\n\n## Useful serve flags\n\n```bash\nbundle exec jekyll serve --drafts\nbundle exec jekyll serve --incremental\nbundle exec jekyll serve --host 0.0.0.0 --port 4000\n```\n\n---\n\n# _config.yml Cheatsheet\n\n{% raw %}\n```yaml\ntitle: My Site\ndescription: Notes and articles\nurl: \"https://example.com\"     # production base\nbaseurl: \"\"                    # if hosted at /subpath, set \"/subpath\"\n\nmarkdown: kramdown\npermalink: /blog/:title/       # or /:categories/:year/:month/:day/:title/\n\ntimezone: America/New_York\n\ncollections:\n  pages:\n    output: true\n\ndefaults:\n  - scope:\n      path: \"\"\n      type: posts\n    values:\n      layout: post\n\nexclude:\n  - node_modules\n  - vendor\n  - Gemfile\n  - Gemfile.lock\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n**Tip:** `baseurl` matters a lot on GitHub Pages project sites.\n\n---\n\n# Posts Cheatsheet\n\n## Post file naming\n\n```text\n_posts/YYYY-MM-DD-title.md\n```\n\n## Post example\n\n```markdown\n---\nlayout: post\ntitle: \"My First Post\"\n---\nThis is my post body.\n```\n\n## Loop all posts\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n<ul>\n  {% for post in site.posts %}\n    <li>\n      <a href=\"{{ post.url | relative_url }}\">{{ post.title }}</a>\n      <small>{{ post.date | date: \"%b %d, %Y\" }}</small>\n    </li>\n  {% endfor %}\n</ul>\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n## Drafts\n\nPut drafts in `_drafts/` without a date prefix.\n\nServe them with:\n\n```bash\nbundle exec jekyll serve --drafts\n```\n\n---\n\n# Pages Cheatsheet\n\n## A page at /about/\n\nCreate `about.md`:\n\n```markdown\n---\nlayout: page\ntitle: About\npermalink: /about/\n---\nHello!\n```\n\n## Page listing example\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n{% assign pages = site.pages | where_exp: \"p\", \"p.title\" %}\n<ul>\n  {% for p in pages %}\n    <li><a href=\"{{ p.url | relative_url }}\">{{ p.title }}</a></li>\n  {% endfor %}\n</ul>\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n---\n\n# Collections Cheatsheet (Beyond posts)\n\n## Define a collection\n\n```yaml\ncollections:\n  projects:\n    output: true\n    permalink: /projects/:name/\n```\n\n## Create items\n\n```text\n_projects/my-project.md\n```\n\n```markdown\n---\ntitle: My Project\n---\nDetails here.\n```\n\n## List collection items\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n<ul>\n  {% for item in site.projects %}\n    <li><a href=\"{{ item.url | relative_url }}\">{{ item.title }}</a></li>\n  {% endfor %}\n</ul>\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n---\n\n# Data Files (_data) Cheatsheet\n\n## _data/navigation.yml\n\n```yaml\n- label: Home\n  url: /\n- label: Blog\n  url: /blog/\n- label: About\n  url: /about/\n```\n\n## Render navigation\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n<nav>\n  <ul>\n    {% for item in site.data.navigation %}\n      <li><a href=\"{{ item.url | relative_url }}\">{{ item.label }}</a></li>\n    {% endfor %}\n  </ul>\n</nav>\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n---\n\n# Liquid Basics Cheatsheet\n\n## Output a variable\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n{{ page.title }}\n{{ site.title }}\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n## If / else\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n{% if page.layout == \"post\" %}\n  <p>Reading a post</p>\n{% else %}\n  <p>Not a post</p>\n{% endif %}\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n## For loop\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n{% for tag in page.tags %}\n  <span>{{ tag }}</span>\n{% endfor %}\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n## Common filters\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n{{ \"hello world\" | upcase }}\n{{ page.date | date: \"%Y-%m-%d\" }}\n{{ \"/assets/css/site.css\" | relative_url }}\n{{ site.url | append: page.url }}\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n## Assign / capture\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n{% assign featured = site.posts | first %}\n{{ featured.title }}\n\n{% capture hero %}\n  <h1>{{ page.title }}</h1>\n{% endcapture %}\n{{ hero }}\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n---\n\n# URLs & Linking (the “don’t break in prod” section)\n\n## Use relative_url and absolute_url\n\n{% raw %}\n```html\n<a href=\"{{ '/about/' | relative_url }}\">About</a>\n<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"{{ '/assets/css/site.css' | relative_url }}\">\n\n<a href=\"{{ '/about/' | absolute_url }}\">Absolute About</a>\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n### Rule of thumb:\n\n- Use `relative_url` for internal paths (safe with baseurl)\n- Use `absolute_url` for canonical URLs, RSS, SEO tags\n\n---\n\n# Assets & Styling Cheatsheet\n\n## Add a stylesheet\n\n{% raw %}\n```html\n<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"{{ '/assets/css/site.css' | relative_url }}\">\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n## Typical assets layout\n\n```text\nassets/css/site.css\nassets/js/site.js\nassets/img/logo.svg\n```\n\n## Sass support (optional)\n\nIf you use Sass:\n\n- Put `.scss` in `_sass/` (partials)\n- Put a main `.scss` in `assets/css/`\n\nExample main file:\n\n```scss\n---\n---\n@import \"base\";\n@import \"layout\";\n```\n\n---\n\n# SEO & Feeds (common plugins)\n\n## RSS feed (common)\n\nPlugin: `jekyll-feed`  \nAdds `/feed.xml`\n\n## SEO tags\n\nPlugin: `jekyll-seo-tag`\n\nUsage in `<head>`:\n\n{% raw %}\n```liquid\n{% seo %}\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n---\n\n# GitHub Pages Notes (practical)\n\nGitHub Pages supports Jekyll builds, but not all plugins (unless you build elsewhere and push `_site/`).\n\nIf you need unrestricted plugins, build on CI (GitHub Actions) and deploy the static output.\n\n---\n\n# Debugging Cheatsheet\n\n## See config values\n\n```liquid\n<pre>{{ site | jsonify }}</pre>\n```\n\n## Common gotchas\n\n- Missing front matter → file won’t be processed as expected\n- baseurl mismatch → broken links/assets on GitHub Pages project sites\n- Wrong permalink → 404s\n- Liquid syntax errors → build fails; check terminal output line numbers\n- Windows line endings can sometimes cause weirdness in scripts/config\n\n---\n\n# Quick Templates (copy/paste)\n\n## _layouts/post.html\n\n{% raw %}\n```html\n---\nlayout: default\n---\n<article class=\"prose\">\n  <h1>{{ page.title }}</h1>\n  <p class=\"meta\">{{ page.date | date: \"%B %d, %Y\" }}</p>\n  {{ content }}\n</article>\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n## Blog index page (blog.md)\n\n{% raw %}\n```markdown\n---\nlayout: page\ntitle: Blog\npermalink: /blog/\n---\n\n<ul>\n  {% for post in site.posts %}\n    <li>\n      <a href=\"{{ post.url | relative_url }}\">{{ post.title }}</a>\n      <small>{{ post.date | date: \"%b %d, %Y\" }}</small>\n    </li>\n  {% endfor %}\n</ul>\n```\n\n## Simple nav include (_includes/header.html)\n\n```html\n<header>\n  <a href=\"{{ '/' | relative_url }}\">{{ site.title }}</a>\n  <nav>\n    <a href=\"{{ '/blog/' | relative_url }}\">Blog</a>\n    <a href=\"{{ '/about/' | relative_url }}\">About</a>\n  </nav>\n</header>\n```\n{% endraw %}\n\n---\n\n# Handy Reference: Variables You’ll Use Most\n\n## Site-level\n\n- site.title, site.description\n- site.url, site.baseurl\n- site.posts\n- site.pages\n- site.data.*\n- site.collections\n\n## Page/post-level\n\n- page.title, page.url, page.permalink\n- page.date, page.categories, page.tags\n- content (only inside layouts)\n\n---\n\n# Checklist: Starting a New Jekyll Site\n\n- Create `_config.yml` with url and baseurl\n- Add `_layouts/default.html` with \\'\\{\\{ content \\}\\}\\'\n- Add `_includes/head.html`, header.html, footer.html\n- Create `index.md`\n- Add first post in `_posts/`\n- Serve locally with `bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload`\n- Deploy `_site/` or let GitHub Pages build (depending on plugin needs)","[https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/](https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/)\n\n## Markdown Cheatsheet\n\nA quick, practical reference for **writing Markdown** (GitHub-flavored where applicable).\n\n---\n\n## 1. Headings\n\n```md\n# H1\n## H2\n### H3\n#### H4\n##### H5\n###### H6\n```\n\n---\n\n## 2. Text Formatting\n\n```md\n**Bold**\n*Italic*\n***Bold & Italic***\n~~Strikethrough~~\n`Inline code`\n```\n\nResult:\n- **Bold**\n- *Italic*\n- ***Bold & Italic***\n- ~~Strikethrough~~\n- `Inline code`\n\n---\n\n## 3. Paragraphs & Line Breaks\n\n```md\nThis is a paragraph.\n\nThis is another paragraph.\n```\n\nLine break (GitHub-flavored): end a line with two spaces.\n\n---\n\n## 4. Lists\n\n### Unordered\n```md\n- Item\n- Item\n  - Nested item\n```\n\n### Ordered\n```md\n1. First\n2. Second\n3. Third\n```\n\n### Task Lists (GitHub)\n```md\n- [x] Done\n- [ ] Todo\n```\n\n---\n\n## 5. Links\n\n```md\n[Link text](https://example.com)\n```\n\n### Auto Links\n```md\nhttps://example.com\n```\n\n---\n\n## 6. Images\n\n```md\n![Alt text](image.png)\n```\n\n---\n\n## 7. Code Blocks\n\n### Fenced Code Block\n```md\n```js\nconsole.log('Hello');\n```\n```\n\n### Inline Code\n```md\nUse `npm install`\n```\n\n---\n\n## 8. Blockquotes\n\n```md\n> This is a quote\n>> Nested quote\n```\n\n---\n\n## 9. Horizontal Rules\n\n```md\n---\n***\n___\n```\n\n---\n\n## 10. Tables (GitHub)\n\n```md\n| Name | Age | Role |\n|------|-----|------|\n| Sam  | 30  | Dev  |\n| Lee  | 28  | PM   |\n```\nResult:  \n<br>\n| Name | Age | Role |\n|------|-----|------|\n| Sam  | 30  | Dev  |\n| Lee  | 28  | PM   |  \n  \n<br>\n\nAlignment:\n```md\n| Left | Center | Right |\n|:-----|:------:|------:|\n```\n\n---\n\n## 11. Escaping Characters\n\n```md\n\\* \\_ \\# \\`\n```\n\n---\n\n## 12. HTML in Markdown\n\n```md\n<b>Bold</b>\n<br />\n```\n\n---\n\n## 13. Emojis (GitHub)\n\n```md\n:rocket: :sparkles: :bug:\n```\n\n---\n\n## 14. Footnotes (Some Parsers)\n\n```md\nHere is a footnote reference[^1].\n\n[^1]: Footnote text\n```\n\n---\n\n## 15. Collapsible Sections (GitHub)\n\n```md\n<details>\n  <summary>Click to expand</summary>\n\n  Hidden content\n</details>\n```\nResult:  \n<br>\n<details>\n  <summary>Click to expand</summary>\n\n  Hidden content\n</details>  \n<br>\n\n---\n\n## 16. File Extensions\n\n- `.md`\n- `.markdown`\n\n---\n\n## 17. Common Use Cases\n\n- README files\n- Documentation\n- GitHub issues & PRs\n- Notes & wikis\n\n---\n\n## 18. Markdown Gotchas\n\n- Blank lines matter\n- Indentation affects lists & code blocks\n- Not all parsers support all features\n\n---\n\n## 19. GitHub-Flavored Markdown Extras\n\n- Tables\n- Task lists\n- Strikethrough\n- Syntax highlighting\n\n---\n\n**Tip:** Keep Markdown simple—readability beats clever formatting.\n\n","[https://tailwindcss.com/docs/installation/framework-guides/nextjs](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/installation/framework-guides/nextjs)\n\n<iframe src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Xb8ajtvFLOk?si=bU8wsFIFT54OVk6B\" title=\"YouTube video player\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" referrerpolicy=\"strict-origin-when-cross-origin\" allowfullscreen></iframe>\n\n## Tailwind CSS Cheatsheet\n\nA practical reference for common **Tailwind CSS** utility classes (Tailwind v3+).\n\n---\n\n## 1. Layout\n\n### Container\n\n```html\n<div class=\"container mx-auto px-4\"></div>\n```\n\n### Display\n\n```md\nblock | inline-block | inline | flex | inline-flex | grid | hidden\n```\n\n```html\n<div class=\"flex\"></div>\n<div class=\"grid\"></div>\n```\n\n### Position\n\n```md\nstatic | relative | absolute | fixed | sticky\n```\n\n```html\n<div class=\"relative\">\n  <div class=\"absolute top-0 right-0\"></div>\n</div>\n```\n\n### Z-Index\n\n```html\n<div class=\"z-10\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 2. Flexbox\n\n### Direction & Wrap\n\n```html\n<div class=\"flex flex-row flex-wrap\"></div>\n<div class=\"flex flex-col\"></div>\n```\n\n### Align Items / Justify\n\n```html\n<div class=\"items-start items-center items-end\"></div>\n<div class=\"justify-start justify-center justify-between justify-end\"></div>\n```\n\n### Gap\n\n```html\n<div class=\"gap-2 gap-4 gap-8\"></div>\n```\n\n### Flex Sizing\n\n```html\n<div class=\"flex-1\"></div>\n<div class=\"flex-none\"></div>\n<div class=\"grow\"></div>\n<div class=\"shrink-0\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 3. Grid\n\n### Columns / Rows\n\n```html\n<div class=\"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3\"></div>\n<div class=\"grid grid-rows-2\"></div>\n```\n\n### Spans\n\n```html\n<div class=\"col-span-2 row-span-2\"></div>\n```\n\n### Gap\n\n```html\n<div class=\"gap-4\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 4. Spacing\n\n### Padding / Margin\n\n```html\n<div class=\"p-4 px-6 py-2\"></div>\n<div class=\"m-4 mx-auto my-2\"></div>\n```\n\n### Space Between (children)\n\n```html\n<div class=\"space-y-4\"></div>\n<div class=\"space-x-2\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 5. Sizing\n\n### Width / Height\n\n```html\n<div class=\"w-full h-screen\"></div>\n<div class=\"w-64 h-48\"></div>\n<div class=\"min-h-screen\"></div>\n<div class=\"max-w-3xl\"></div>\n```\n\n### Aspect Ratio\n\n```html\n<div class=\"aspect-video\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 6. Typography\n\n### Font Size / Weight\n\n```html\n<p class=\"text-sm text-base text-lg text-xl text-2xl\"></p>\n<p class=\"font-normal font-medium font-semibold font-bold\"></p>\n```\n\n### Line Height / Tracking\n\n```html\n<p class=\"leading-tight leading-normal leading-relaxed\"></p>\n<p class=\"tracking-tight tracking-wide\"></p>\n```\n\n### Alignment\n\n```html\n<p class=\"text-left text-center text-right\"></p>\n```\n\n### Text Transform\n\n```html\n<p class=\"uppercase lowercase capitalize\"></p>\n```\n\n### Truncation\n\n```html\n<p class=\"truncate\"></p>\n<p class=\"line-clamp-2\"></p>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 7. Colors\n\n### Text / Background\n\n```html\n<div class=\"text-gray-900 bg-gray-100\"></div>\n<div class=\"text-white bg-blue-600\"></div>\n```\n\n### Opacity\n\n```html\n<div class=\"bg-black/50\"></div>\n<div class=\"text-white/80\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 8. Borders & Radius\n\n### Border\n\n```html\n<div class=\"border border-gray-200\"></div>\n<div class=\"border-t border-b\"></div>\n```\n\n### Radius\n\n```html\n<div class=\"rounded rounded-md rounded-lg rounded-xl rounded-2xl\"></div>\n<div class=\"rounded-full\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 9. Shadows\n\n```html\n<div class=\"shadow shadow-md shadow-lg shadow-xl\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 10. Backgrounds\n\n### Gradients\n\n```html\n<div class=\"bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-500 via-purple-500 to-pink-500\"></div>\n```\n\n### Background Image / Cover\n\n```html\n<div class=\"bg-cover bg-center\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 11. Effects\n\n### Opacity\n\n```html\n<div class=\"opacity-0 opacity-50 opacity-100\"></div>\n```\n\n### Blur\n\n```html\n<div class=\"blur-sm blur-md blur-lg\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 12. Transitions & Animation\n\n### Transition\n\n```html\n<button class=\"transition duration-200 ease-in-out hover:scale-105\"></button>\n```\n\n### Common\n\n```html\n<div class=\"transition-colors\"></div>\n<div class=\"transition-transform\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 13. Hover / Focus / Active\n\n```html\n<button class=\"bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400 active:scale-95\">\n  Button\n</button>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 14. Responsive Breakpoints\n\n```md\nsm: 640px\nmd: 768px\nlg: 1024px\nxl: 1280px\n2xl: 1536px\n```\n\nExample:\n\n```html\n<div class=\"p-2 md:p-6 lg:p-10\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 15. Dark Mode\n\n```html\n<div class=\"bg-white text-gray-900 dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 16. State Variants\n\n```md\nhover: focus: active: disabled:\nfirst: last: odd: even:\npeer-*, group-*\n```\n\n### Group Hover\n\n```html\n<div class=\"group\">\n  <span class=\"group-hover:underline\">Hover parent</span>\n</div>\n```\n\n### Peer\n\n```html\n<input class=\"peer\" />\n<p class=\"hidden peer-focus:block\">Shows on focus</p>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 17. Forms\n\n```html\n<input class=\"w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400\" />\n```\n\n---\n\n## 18. Common UI Patterns\n\n### Card\n\n```html\n<div class=\"rounded-2xl border border-gray-200 bg-white p-6 shadow-md\">\n  <h3 class=\"text-lg font-semibold\">Title</h3>\n  <p class=\"mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600\">Body text</p>\n</div>\n```\n\n### Button\n\n```html\n<button class=\"inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md bg-blue-600 px-4 py-2 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 active:scale-95 transition\">\n  Click\n</button>\n```\n\n### Input + Label\n\n```html\n<label class=\"block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700\">Email</label>\n<input class=\"mt-1 w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2\" />\n```\n\n---\n\n## 19. Customization\n\n### Arbitrary Values\n\n```html\n<div class=\"w-[420px] top-[3.25rem] bg-[#0f172a]\"></div>\n```\n\n### Extend in tailwind.config\n\n```js\n// theme.extend: colors, spacing, fonts, etc.\n```\n\n---\n\n## 20. Gotchas & Tips\n\n* Prefer `gap-*` over margins for spacing in flex/grid.\n* Use `container mx-auto` for centered layouts.\n* Use `prose` (Typography plugin) for rich text.\n* Use `clsx`/`cn` helper for conditional classes.\n\n---\n\n**Tip:** Build by composing utilities; extract components when repetition shows up.\n","This post was added directly from Github. Sizing\n\n### Width / Height\n\n```html\n<div class=\"w-full h-screen\"></div>\n<div class=\"w-64 h-48\"></div>\n<div class=\"min-h-screen\"></div>\n<div class=\"max-w-3xl\"></div>\n```\n\n### Aspect Ratio\n\n```html\n<div class=\"aspect-video\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 6. Typography\n\n### Font Size / Weight\n\n```html\n<p class=\"text-sm text-base text-lg text-xl text-2xl\"></p>\n<p class=\"font-normal font-medium font-semibold font-bold\"></p>\n```\n\n### Line Height / Tracking\n\n```html\n<p class=\"leading-tight leading-normal leading-relaxed\"></p>\n<p class=\"tracking-tight tracking-wide\"></p>\n```\n\n### Alignment\n\n```html\n<p class=\"text-left text-center text-right\"></p>\n```\n\n### Text Transform\n\n```html\n<p class=\"uppercase lowercase capitalize\"></p>\n```\n\n### Truncation\n\n```html\n<p class=\"truncate\"></p>\n<p class=\"line-clamp-2\"></p>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 7. Colors\n\n### Text / Background\n\n```html\n<div class=\"text-gray-900 bg-gray-100\"></div>\n<div class=\"text-white bg-blue-600\"></div>\n```\n\n### Opacity\n\n```html\n<div class=\"bg-black/50\"></div>\n<div class=\"text-white/80\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 8. Borders & Radius\n\n### Border\n\n```html\n<div class=\"border border-gray-200\"></div>\n<div class=\"border-t border-b\"></div>\n```\n\n### Radius\n\n```html\n<div class=\"rounded rounded-md rounded-lg rounded-xl rounded-2xl\"></div>\n<div class=\"rounded-full\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 9. Shadows\n\n```html\n<div class=\"shadow shadow-md shadow-lg shadow-xl\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 10. Backgrounds\n\n### Gradients\n\n```html\n<div class=\"bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-500 via-purple-500 to-pink-500\"></div>\n```\n\n### Background Image / Cover\n\n```html\n<div class=\"bg-cover bg-center\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 11. Effects\n\n### Opacity\n\n```html\n<div class=\"opacity-0 opacity-50 opacity-100\"></div>\n```\n\n### Blur\n\n```html\n<div class=\"blur-sm blur-md blur-lg\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 12. Transitions & Animation\n\n### Transition\n\n```html\n<button class=\"transition duration-200 ease-in-out hover:scale-105\"></button>\n```\n\n### Common\n\n```html\n<div class=\"transition-colors\"></div>\n<div class=\"transition-transform\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 13. Hover / Focus / Active\n\n```html\n<button class=\"bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400 active:scale-95\">\n  Button\n</button>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 14. Responsive Breakpoints\n\n```md\nsm: 640px\nmd: 768px\nlg: 1024px\nxl: 1280px\n2xl: 1536px\n```\n\nExample:\n\n```html\n<div class=\"p-2 md:p-6 lg:p-10\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 15. Dark Mode\n\n```html\n<div class=\"bg-white text-gray-900 dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100\"></div>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 16. State Variants\n\n```md\nhover: focus: active: disabled:\nfirst: last: odd: even:\npeer-*, group-*\n```\n\n### Group Hover\n\n```html\n<div class=\"group\">\n  <span class=\"group-hover:underline\">Hover parent</span>\n</div>\n```\n\n### Peer\n\n```html\n<input class=\"peer\" />\n<p class=\"hidden peer-focus:block\">Shows on focus</p>\n```\n\n---\n\n## 17. Forms\n\n```html\n<input class=\"w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400\" />\n```\n\n---\n\n## 18. Common UI Patterns\n\n### Card\n\n```html\n<div class=\"rounded-2xl border border-gray-200 bg-white p-6 shadow-md\">\n  <h3 class=\"text-lg font-semibold\">Title</h3>\n  <p class=\"mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600\">Body text</p>\n</div>\n```\n\n### Button\n\n```html\n<button class=\"inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md bg-blue-600 px-4 py-2 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 active:scale-95 transition\">\n  Click\n</button>\n```\n\n### Input + Label\n\n```html\n<label class=\"block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700\">Email</label>\n<input class=\"mt-1 w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2\" />\n```\n\n---\n\n## 19. Customization\n\n### Arbitrary Values\n\n```html\n<div class=\"w-[420px] top-[3.25rem] bg-[#0f172a]\"></div>\n```\n\n### Extend in tailwind.config\n\n```js\n// theme.extend: colors, spacing, fonts, etc.\n```\n\n---\n\n## 20. Gotchas & Tips\n\n* Prefer `gap-*` over margins for spacing in flex/grid.\n* Use `container mx-auto` for centered layouts.\n* Use `prose` (Typography plugin) for rich text.\n* Use `clsx`/`cn` helper for conditional classes.\n\n---\n\n**Tip:** Build by composing utilities; extract components when repetition shows up.\n","[https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/](https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/)\n\n## Markdown Cheatsheet\n\nA quick, practical reference for **writing Markdown** (GitHub-flavored where applicable).\n\n---\n\n## 1. Headings\n\n```md\n# H1\n## H2\n### H3\n#### H4\n##### H5\n###### H6\n```\n\n---\n\n## 2. Text Formatting\n\n```md\n**Bold**\n*Italic*\n***Bold & Italic***\n~~Strikethrough~~\n`Inline code`\n```\n\nResult:\n- **Bold**\n- *Italic*\n- ***Bold & Italic***\n- ~~Strikethrough~~\n- `Inline code`\n\n---\n\n## 3. Paragraphs & Line Breaks\n\n```md\nThis is a paragraph.\n\nThis is another paragraph.\n```\n\nLine break (GitHub-flavored): end a line with two spaces.\n\n---\n\n## 4. Lists\n\n### Unordered\n```md\n- Item\n- Item\n  - Nested item\n```\n\n### Ordered\n```md\n1. First\n2. Second\n3. Third\n```\n\n### Task Lists (GitHub)\n```md\n- [x] Done\n- [ ] Todo\n```\n\n---\n\n## 5. Links\n\n```md\n[Link text](https://example.com)\n```\n\n### Auto Links\n```md\nhttps://example.com\n```\n\n---\n\n## 6. Images\n\n```md\n![Alt text](image.png)\n```\n\n---\n\n## 7. Code Blocks\n\n### Fenced Code Block\n```md\n```js\nconsole.log('Hello');\n```\n```\n\n### Inline Code\n```md\nUse `npm install`\n```\n\n---\n\n## 8. Blockquotes\n\n```md\n> This is a quote\n>> Nested quote\n```\n\n---\n\n## 9. Horizontal Rules\n\n```md\n---\n***\n___\n```\n\n---\n\n## 10. Tables (GitHub)\n\n```md\n| Name | Age | Role |\n|------|-----|------|\n| Sam  | 30  | Dev  |\n| Lee  | 28  | PM   |\n```\nResult:  \n<br>\n| Name | Age | Role |\n|------|-----|------|\n| Sam  | 30  | Dev  |\n| Lee  | 28  | PM   |  \n  \n<br>\n\nAlignment:\n```md\n| Left | Center | Right |\n|:-----|:------:|------:|\n```\n\n---\n\n## 11. Escaping Characters\n\n```md\n\\* \\_ \\# \\`\n```\n\n---\n\n## 12. HTML in Markdown\n\n```md\n<b>Bold</b>\n<br />\n```\n\n---\n\n## 13. Emojis (GitHub)\n\n```md\n:rocket: :sparkles: :bug:\n```\n\n---\n\n## 14. Footnotes (Some Parsers)\n\n```md\nHere is a footnote reference[^1].\n\n[^1]: Footnote text\n```\n\n---\n\n## 15. Collapsible Sections (GitHub)\n\n```md\n<details>\n  <summary>Click to expand</summary>\n\n  Hidden content\n</details>\n```\nResult:  \n<br>\n<details>\n  <summary>Click to expand</summary>\n\n  Hidden content\n</details>  \n<br>\n\n---\n\n## 16. File Extensions\n\n- `.md`\n- `.markdown`\n\n---\n\n## 17. Common Use Cases\n\n- README files\n- Documentation\n- GitHub issues & PRs\n- Notes & wikis\n\n---\n\n## 18. Markdown Gotchas\n\n- Blank lines matter\n- Indentation affects lists & code blocks\n- Not all parsers support all features\n\n---\n\n## 19. GitHub-Flavored Markdown Extras\n\n- Tables\n- Task lists\n- Strikethrough\n- Syntax highlighting\n\n---\n\n**Tip:** Keep Markdown simple—readability beats clever formatting.\n\n","<!doctype html>\n<html lang=\"en\">\n  <head>\n  <meta charset=\"utf-8\" />\n  <meta http-equiv=\"X-UA-Compatible\" content=\"IE=edge\" />\n\n  <!-- Mobile -->\n  <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1\" />\n\n  <!-- Prevent flash and apply stored/system theme before paint -->\n  <script>\n    (function () {\n      var key = \"theme\";\n      var stored = localStorage.getItem(key);\n      var isDark = stored ? stored === \"dark\" : window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\").matches;\n      document.documentElement.classList.toggle(\"dark\", isDark);\n      document.documentElement.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", isDark ? \"dark\" : \"light\");\n    })();\n  </script>\n\n  <!-- Title -->\n  <title>\n    \n      Github Pages | Dev-pages\n <h1>Github Pages</h1>\n  <p class=\"text-slate-500 text-sm dark:text-neutral-400 mb-8\">\n    February 23, 2026\n  </p>\n\n  <p><a href=\"https://docs.github.com/en/pages\">https://docs.github.com/en/pages</a></p>\n\n<h1 id=\"jekyll--github-pages--complete-user-guide\">Jekyll + GitHub Pages — Complete User Guide</h1>\n\n<p>A practical, step-by-step guide to building and deploying a Jekyll website using GitHub Pages.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"table-of-contents\">Table of Contents</h1>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>What You’re Building</li>\n  <li>Prerequisites</li>\n  <li>Creating a New Jekyll Site</li>\n  <li>Understanding the Project Structure</li>\n  <li>Running Jekyll Locally</li>\n  <li>Creating Posts and Pages</li>\n  <li>Configuring <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></li>\n  <li>Using Liquid (Templating Basics)</li>\n  <li>Preparing for GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li>Deploying to GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li>Custom Domains</li>\n  <li>Troubleshooting</li>\n  <li>Best Practices</li>\n</ol>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"1-what-youre-building\">1. What You’re Building</h1>\n\n<p>Jekyll is a <strong>static site generator</strong>.</p>\n\n<p>You write:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Markdown</li>\n  <li>HTML</li>\n  <li>YAML config</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Jekyll generates:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Static HTML files</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>GitHub Pages hosts:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>The generated static site</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"2-prerequisites\">2. Prerequisites</h1>\n\n<p>Install:</p>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Ruby (recommended via rbenv or asdf)</li>\n  <li>Bundler</li>\n  <li>Git</li>\n  <li>GitHub account</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Check versions:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>ruby <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\ngem <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\nbundle <span class=\"nt\">-v</span>\ngit <span class=\"nt\">--version</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"3-creating-a-new-jekyll-site\">3. Creating a New Jekyll Site</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"create-project\">Create project</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>gem <span class=\"nb\">install </span>jekyll bundler\njekyll new my-site\n<span class=\"nb\">cd </span>my-site\nbundle <span class=\"nb\">install</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"project-structure\">Project structure</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>my-site/\n├── _config.yml\n├── _posts/\n├── _layouts/\n├── _includes/\n├── _site/        (generated)\n├── Gemfile\n└── index.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"4-running-jekyll-locally\">4. Running Jekyll Locally</h1>\n\n<p>Start the development server:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve <span class=\"nt\">--livereload</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Visit:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>http://localhost:4000\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Build only:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll build\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Clean:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll clean\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"5-creating-posts\">5. Creating Posts</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"file-naming-format\">File naming format</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>_posts/YYYY-MM-DD-title.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Example:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-markdown highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n<span class=\"na\">layout</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">post</span>\n<span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">My</span><span class=\"nv\"> </span><span class=\"s\">First</span><span class=\"nv\"> </span><span class=\"s\">Post\"</span>\n<span class=\"na\">date</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">2026-02-24</span>\n<span class=\"na\">categories</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"pi\">[</span><span class=\"nv\">blog</span><span class=\"pi\">]</span>\n<span class=\"na\">tags</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"pi\">[</span><span class=\"nv\">jekyll</span><span class=\"pi\">,</span> <span class=\"nv\">github</span><span class=\"pi\">]</span>\n<span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n\nThis is my first post.\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"6-creating-pages\">6. Creating Pages</h1>\n\n<p>Create a page like <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">about.md</code>:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-markdown highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n<span class=\"na\">layout</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">page</span>\n<span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">About</span>\n<span class=\"na\">permalink</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">/about/</span>\n<span class=\"nn\">---</span>\n\nThis is the about page.\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"7-understanding-_configyml\">7. Understanding <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></h1>\n\n<p>Example configuration:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-yaml highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"na\">title</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">My Website</span>\n<span class=\"na\">description</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">Personal blog</span>\n<span class=\"na\">url</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">https://username.github.io\"</span>\n<span class=\"na\">baseurl</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">\"</span>   <span class=\"c1\"># Use \"/repo-name\" for project sites</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">markdown</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">kramdown</span>\n<span class=\"na\">permalink</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">/blog/:title/</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">timezone</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s\">America/New_York</span>\n\n<span class=\"na\">plugins</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span>\n  <span class=\"pi\">-</span> <span class=\"s\">jekyll-feed</span>\n  <span class=\"pi\">-</span> <span class=\"s\">jekyll-seo-tag</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"important-baseurl\">Important: baseurl</h2>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>User site → <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">\"\"</code></li>\n  <li>Project site → <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">\"/repository-name\"</code></li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Example:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-yaml highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code><span class=\"na\">baseurl</span><span class=\"pi\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"</span><span class=\"s\">/my-repo\"</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"8-using-liquid-templating\">8. Using Liquid (Templating)</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"output-variables\">Output variables</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>Dev-pages\nGithub Pages\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"loop-posts\">Loop posts</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>&lt;ul&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/24/testpost/\"&gt;\n        My New Post\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/24/tailwind/\"&gt;\n        Tailwind\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/24/markdown/\"&gt;\n        Markdown\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/24/jekyll/\"&gt;\n        Jekyll\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n    &lt;li&gt;\n      &lt;a href=\"/dev-pages/documents/2026/02/23/github-pages/\"&gt;\n        Github Pages\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    &lt;/li&gt;\n  \n&lt;/ul&gt;\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"conditionals\">Conditionals</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>\n  &lt;p&gt;This is a blog post&lt;/p&gt;\n\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"9-preparing-for-github-pages\">9. Preparing for GitHub Pages</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"commit-your-project\">Commit your project</h2>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>git init\ngit add <span class=\"nb\">.</span>\ngit commit <span class=\"nt\">-m</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"Initial commit\"</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<h2 id=\"create-github-repository\">Create GitHub repository</h2>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Go to GitHub</li>\n  <li>Click “New Repository”</li>\n  <li>Name it:</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>User site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>username.github.io\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Project site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>my-project\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"10-deploying-to-github-pages\">10. Deploying to GitHub Pages</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"option-a--let-github-build-jekyll-recommended-for-simple-sites\">Option A — Let GitHub Build Jekyll (Recommended for simple sites)</h2>\n\n<p>Push to GitHub:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>git remote add origin https://github.com/username/repo-name.git\ngit branch <span class=\"nt\">-M</span> main\ngit push <span class=\"nt\">-u</span> origin main\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Then:</p>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Go to Repository Settings</li>\n  <li>Click “Pages”</li>\n  <li>Under “Source” → Select:\n    <ul>\n      <li>Branch: <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">main</code></li>\n      <li>Folder: <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">/ (root)</code></li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n  <li>Save</li>\n</ol>\n\n<p>Your site will be available at:</p>\n\n<p>User site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>https://username.github.io\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Project site:</p>\n<div class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>https://username.github.io/repo-name/\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"option-b--deploy-built-_site-folder-advanced\">Option B — Deploy Built <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> Folder (Advanced)</h2>\n\n<p>Build locally:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll build\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Deploy <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> contents to <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">gh-pages</code> branch.</p>\n\n<p>Often done with GitHub Actions.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"11-custom-domain\">11. Custom Domain</h1>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Add a <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">CNAME</code> file to project root:</li>\n</ol>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>example.com\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<ol>\n  <li>Commit and push</li>\n  <li>In GitHub Pages settings:\n    <ul>\n      <li>Add custom domain</li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n  <li>Configure DNS:\n    <ul>\n      <li>A record → GitHub IPs</li>\n      <li>OR CNAME → username.github.io</li>\n    </ul>\n  </li>\n</ol>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"12-github-pages-plugin-limitations\">12. GitHub Pages Plugin Limitations</h1>\n\n<p>GitHub Pages only supports approved plugins.</p>\n\n<p>Supported examples:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>jekyll-feed</li>\n  <li>jekyll-seo-tag</li>\n  <li>jekyll-sitemap</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>If you need custom plugins:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Use GitHub Actions</li>\n  <li>Build site yourself</li>\n  <li>Deploy static output</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"13-drafts\">13. Drafts</h1>\n\n<p>Create <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_drafts/</code> folder.</p>\n\n<p>Add:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>_drafts/my-draft.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<p>Serve with:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve <span class=\"nt\">--drafts</span>\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"14-common-issues\">14. Common Issues</h1>\n\n<h2 id=\"broken-css-or-links\">Broken CSS or Links</h2>\n\n<p>Cause:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Incorrect <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">baseurl</code></li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Fix:\nUse:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-liquid highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>/dev-pages/assets/css/style.css\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"404-errors\">404 Errors</h2>\n\n<p>Cause:</p>\n<ul>\n  <li>Wrong permalink</li>\n  <li>Missing trailing slash</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"liquid-errors\">Liquid Errors</h2>\n\n<p>Check terminal output for line numbers.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h2 id=\"site-not-updating\">Site Not Updating</h2>\n\n<p>Try:</p>\n\n<div class=\"language-bash highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>bundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll clean\nbundle <span class=\"nb\">exec </span>jekyll serve\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"15-recommended-folder-structure\">15. Recommended Folder Structure</h1>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>.\n├── _config.yml\n├── _layouts/\n├── _includes/\n├── _posts/\n├── _data/\n├── assets/\n│   ├── css/\n│   ├── js/\n│   └── img/\n└── index.md\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"16-best-practices\">16. Best Practices</h1>\n\n<ul>\n  <li>Always use <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">relative_url</code></li>\n  <li>Keep layouts minimal</li>\n  <li>Use collections for custom content types</li>\n  <li>Avoid heavy plugins</li>\n  <li>Keep <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_site/</code> out of git (add to <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">.gitignore</code>)</li>\n  <li>Test locally before pushing</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"17-quick-deployment-checklist\">17. Quick Deployment Checklist</h1>\n\n<ul class=\"task-list\">\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Install Ruby + Bundler</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Create Jekyll site</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Configure <code class=\"language-plaintext highlighter-rouge\">_config.yml</code></li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Test locally</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Create GitHub repository</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Push code</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Enable GitHub Pages</li>\n  <li class=\"task-list-item\"><input type=\"checkbox\" class=\"task-list-item-checkbox\" disabled=\"disabled\" />Verify live URL</li>\n</ul>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h1 id=\"18-final-workflow-summary\">18. Final Workflow Summary</h1>\n\n<div class=\"language-text highlighter-rouge\"><div class=\"highlight\"><pre class=\"highlight\"><code>Write Markdown\n      ↓\nRun jekyll serve\n      ↓\nCommit &amp; push to GitHub\n      ↓\nGitHub Pages builds site\n      ↓\nWebsite is live\n</code></pre></div></div>\n\n<hr />\n\n<p>You now have a complete workflow for building and deploying Jekyll sites with GitHub Pages.</p>\n\n</article>\n\n        </main>\n\n      </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <footer class=\"bg-slate-100 border-t border-slate-200 mt-16 dark:bg-neutral-950 dark:border-neutral-800\">\n serve\n```\n\n## This ensures:\n\nYou're using the Jekyll version defined in your Gemfile\nNot some global Ruby version installed on your system\n\n## Run both\nIn one terminal Common gotchas

  • Missing front matter → file won’t be processed as expected
  • baseurl mismatch → broken links/assets on GitHub Pages project sites
  • Wrong permalink → 404s
  • Liquid syntax errors → build fails; check terminal output line numbers
  • Windows line endings can sometimes cause weirdness in scripts/config

Quick Templates (copy/paste)

_layouts/post.html

---
layout: default
---
<article class="prose">
  <h1>{{ page.title }}</h1>
  <p class="meta">{{ page.date | date: "%B %d, %Y" }}</p>
  {{ content }}
</article>

Blog index page (blog.md)

---
layout: page
title: Blog
permalink: /blog/
---

<ul>
  {% for post in site.posts %}
    <li>
      <a href="{{ post.url | relative_url }}">{{ post.title }}</a>
      <small>{{ post.date | date: "%b %d, %Y" }}</small>
    </li>
  {% endfor %}
</ul>

Simple nav include (_includes/header.html)

<header>
  <a href="{{ '/' | relative_url }}">{{ site.title }}</a>
  <nav>
    <a href="{{ '/blog/' | relative_url }}">Blog</a>
    <a href="{{ '/about/' | relative_url }}">About</a>
  </nav>
</header>

Handy Reference: Variables You’ll Use Most

Site-level

  • site.title, site.description
  • site.url, site.baseurl
  • site.posts
  • site.pages
  • site.data.*
  • site.collections

Page/post-level

  • page.title, page.url, page.permalink
  • page.date, page.categories, page.tags
  • content (only inside layouts)

Checklist: Starting a New Jekyll Site

  • Create _config.yml with url and baseurl
  • Add _layouts/default.html with '{{ content }}'
  • Add _includes/head.html, header.html, footer.html
  • Create index.md
  • Add first post in _posts/
  • Serve locally with bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
  • Deploy _site/ or let GitHub Pages build (depending on plugin needs)
